[http://owncloud.org ownCloud] is a service deployed on the WCRL cluster enabling automatic synchronization of files between home directories and personal devices.

This functionality can be convenient when using WebCML on the cluster.




== Procedure for Enabling Cluster ownCloud Access ==

1. *Access Request*
    Contact the WCRL system administrator and request access to ownCloud.
    Once a reply has been received, proceed to the next step.  


2. *Configuration on Cluster*

   To enable your ownCloud share directory on the cluster,
   log in via SSH and execute

   {{{
       > sudo wcrl-owncloud-setup
   }}}

   Enter your WCRL cluster password when prompted.

   Your cluster home directory will contain a new directory
   {{{
       ~/oc
   }}}
    which contains all files synchronized to your ownCloud account.


2. *Client installation*

   On the machine to be synchronized with your cluster ownCloud directory, download and install the client for your platform located at
[ https://owncloud.org/install/ ]
